creator: illlusion
descriptionHtml:
Element Universal Remote Control designed by Illusions Inc can be used very easily and you will feel like a real Element Universal Remote Control because it has all the functionalities which an ordinary Element remote control can perform.
We have designed this with least application size in the market so that users having slow internet connections can install it easily.
Element Universal Remote Control App is easy to configure by following two step guideline. We have also uploaded screenshot as a guidance for the users. Once you have Configured this Element Remote Control App you do not need to configure it again for the same device.
Once you have Configured this Element Universal Remote app with your Element Device it can easily be found in the "Saved Devices".

This Application has the following features:
>> Easy to Install.
>> Easy to configure.
>> Needs built in IR blaster for configuration.
>> Configured Device is saved in "Saved Devices"
>> Supports multiple configures devices and can be found in "Saved Devices"
>> Supports all the functionalities which as company built ordinary remote can perform.
>> Vibration on pressing Button can be enabled and disabled.

Moreover this Element Universal Remote Control Can be used as:
>> Element Universal TV Remote Control.
>> Element TV Remote Control.
>> Element Set Top Box Remote Control
>> Element Projector Remote Control
>> Element AV Receiver Remote Control
>> Element Home Theatre Remote Control
>> Element DVD Remote Control


Disclaimer:
1. It is IR based remote controller, you should have a built-in IR transmitter or external infrared to control the TV.
2. This is not official remote control of Element Company. We have just collected the codes for the convenience of users.This remote just controls the functionalities of Element Devices.
3. Please Read the whole description before any negative feedback.
descriptionShort: Element Universal Remote Control App is easy to configure and use.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
>>Performance of the app has been improved.
>>More models have been added.
>>Bugs and errors have been removed
